Player History
Drafted in 7th round, 82nd overall pick, by Houston in 2019...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/5/2019, off David Buell (BAL)...
Earned first career win on 4/23/2019...
Was selected to the 2019 Allstar game...
Traded from Houston to Milwaukee on 3/2/2020 (Going to MIL: P Charles Manuel, RF Jose Contreras. Going to HOU: P Jamaal Bray, 3B Ariel Santiago)...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/25/2020, winning 2 games with a 3.60 ERA...
Signed as a free agent by Milwaukee on 2/11/2021 to a 1-year deal worth $3,000,000 per year...
